content.label: Customer chat gets stuck, doesn‚Äôt have features other bank apps have too. Difficult to close accounts with the bank - a bank that doesn‚Äôt boost user‚Äôs confidence.
Safe and easy use of digital banking.
Even after the card due is settled, the app is so bad that it still keeps displaying the amount due instead of becoming 0.

title.label: Easy and convenient with mobile app

content.label: Very quick and easy with the mobile app.. simply log in and the payment transaction can be done quickly without queue at the counter !!

I am glad to use the app conveniently and intuitively.

Performing my transactions are fast and assuring. Products are easily found in just a few clicks.

Thank you!

Out of sudden the app faceID cannot launch. Checked faceID was enabled and my other banking apps works fine with the faceID.

Software issues. Now I can‚Äôt access.
By far the most improved mobile banking app across the local banks!

title.label: Updated outstanding balance - when payment is made

content.label:
Currently the app only shows amount due to pay but does not update the due should the
Payor made partial payments . It still reflects as total amount outstanding. It will be good to have this ‚Äúreal- time‚Äù updated the outstanding amount
can‚Äôt refer a friend keeps saying not able to land on sc referral club and ask me to open a deposit acc which i alr have

title.label: No way to reach customer service on hotline

content.label: No way to reach customer service except for fraud. Decided to cancel card due to poor customer support.

title.label: Correct PW but was unable to log in

content.label: Despite keying the correct PW, the mobile app rejected numerous time. There is no way I have keyed the wrong PW as I have only accessed it recently. Deleted and reinstalled the app, still the same. Doesn‚Äôt help on top of this, the SCB 24hr hotline isn‚Äôt user friendly as well to request for assistance.

Among all banking app. posb digibank, OCBC digital, UOB Tmrw and SC mobile‚Ä¶

SC mobile is by far the worst! 
Even if you keyed in the correct username and password, they will still lock u out. Ridiculous. No way one day i keyed in correctly and then the next day with the same info are all wrong

Call on 9/6/24 11.55am to 12.10pm. A gentleman name Daren (if I heard his name correctly) is very patient to answer all my question Ned help me with a fraud transaction that was not done by me last month and was still indicated into bill although I called last month and was given a new card. He help me settle all these problem with so much patience and assurance. Thank you for making such unpleasant experience into a assuring one

OK for basic needs. Laggy and buggy for almost everything else. Constant errors while trying to update communication preferences, app clicks taking you to website which says you should click in app to enable offers leading to circular logic. Emails offers not reflecting in app (only way to accept offers is in app). Etc etc. Perhaps well planned but very poorly executed.

Got scammed: transaction wasn‚Äôt authorized. 
Took me a long time to reinstall my internet banking.
I had to insist. And insist. And call again.
Hotline not convenient and you can barely hear the employees from the call center.
Lovely helpful people at the various branches, but they hardly make up for the terrible service provided.
With the new update, view balance for both deposit and credit card is not as easy compared to the past.
Very nice UX. You are the best.

title.label: Unable to register account using card number

content.label:
Keep failing when trying to register an account by card number. 
Tried to call hotline and there is no option related and can‚Äôt get to a human support! Have been trying for days and unsuccessful. Frustrated.

title.label: YOU CANT CHANGE DAILY TRANSFER LIMIT

content.label:
I can‚Äôt change the daily transfer limit in the app. I can‚Äôt change the limit on the website either event if I have already set up the SC Mobile Key on my iPhone. 
I can‚Äôt use the chat service because it‚Äôs not available. If it‚Äôs not available, why you put it there OMG.
I guess I have to do it at the bank counter. 
They are encountering serious technical issues or they just did it on purpose. I‚Äôm no longer banking with SC.
Terrible user experience.
Crappy buggy app
Staff nice and patient explain to me. Will recommended all my friends for using Scb credit card. üëç
Staandard Chartered is very efficient and reliable. The application for card is smooth, fast and easy.

Despite being a frequent spender and never being late for a single payment, I‚Äôm not eligible for a fee waiver, unlike other banks. 

Support hotline is confusing with many layers to go through, end up also never connect you to any agents.

Cancelled my card, goodbye SC.
I am trying to do an urgent transaction.  App update was forced and it is taking ages to load in App Store.

title.label: Slow PayNow Transactions and Sluggish UI

content.label: App takes way too long to perform PayNow transactions to other banks and too much emphasis on animations rather than fluidity and animations

title.label: Hope you will never need some human help

content.label:
My experience as a customer needed some help 
- phone banking customer service will never direct you to an agent 
- live chat get ALWAYS disconnected when it comes to provide you with an helpful answer 
- been 2 times in the Singapore central branch. People are juniors, probably just hired from college and put there without trainings. They don‚Äôt have bank knowledge or customer relation experience/discipline to manage clients. I was embarrassed for the poor guys. 

FYI Problem statement that was never resolved : 
Choose SC for credit card (cashback reason mainly). After 3 months usage had to block the card due to fraudulent transactions. My card and transactions disappear from the app and I never got my cashback. No possibility to get help and solve the issue after 2 months effort. From any channel. 

Not recommended
Best banking app available so far

App keeps crashing when I tried to access the billed and unbilled information since the latest update. Tried to inform the bank customer service through the in app chat but no help at all. Asked me whether I have updated my phone version to the latest. When I told her I did and in fact I check everyday for latest version, she seems to doubt what I said. Btw, her name is Karen. And sort of mocked me ‚Äúthat‚Äôs great, you check your phone everyday for latest versions‚Äù. When I told her I can‚Äôt get out to the app home page to confirm something because I‚Äôm chatting with her via the app. Again she doubted what I said ‚ÄúI would have access to your particulars if you chatted in the app‚Äù. Why would I lie?! Could it not be that their app is really not up to the mark!! This is ridiculous. First of all the lousy pp and now bd customer service.
The worst baking app in Singapore. Change the apps from bad to worst. You sure know how to loose customers!!!

The ‚Äúbilled‚Äù and ‚Äúunbilled‚Äù tabs under credit card are bugged. It cannot be selected and when tapped, the app crashes in approximately five seconds. 

 Replying to the comment that to ensure you have the latest version. This happened after updating to the LATEST version. Maybe spend more time checking at the issue pointed out by users instead of putting up replies based on generic templates.

Yeah the app is stable and nice and all but I‚Äôm not a fan of the fonts, seems a little informal.

Also, can y‚Äôall please change the name of the app to incorporate StanChart or something? I‚Äôm always searching for Stan and it doesn‚Äôt show up, then I realise, your app‚Äôs name is SC which people don‚Äôt really associate with. I suggest renaming it to ‚ÄúStanChart (SC Mobile)‚Äù. Thanks.

While I like the new UI, it is more style over substance. The app is super buggy, purchase validation somehow always rejects my order even though I pressed ‚Äúapprove‚Äù, and the app is always always under maintenance. Very bad user experience.

All while I been paying my credit card bill promptly , except 1 accident and I‚Äôm late for just 1 day , was rejected of my late waiver request it is very disappointing, I even refer standard chartered to my friend , the operator inside that bank has no way to help me , and after this month I clear my payment will not be continued with standard chartered, as well will share my experience to my friend not to use it

title.label: Can‚Äôt view transactions on Mobile App

content.label: SC mobile app used to be very good. Now, I can‚Äôt even load any of my transaction records. This has been happening for many days now with no fix. Consider this to be really critical when customers need to check on their credit card charges and cannot wait for days for it to generate. I urge the team to look into this with urgency.

title.label: perfect seamless to use with enticing graphics!

content.label: as above
I‚Äôve made payment of 1386.40 on 3 rd March but not reflected it already been deducted from my bank. Please get back to me it‚Äôs so difficult to raise a service request it‚Äôs invalid stupid app
In the credit card details, there are duplicate menu and the other menu will be pushed down. Please keep the most important menu on top.
Custom

title.label: Where is the cvv display in the app??

content.label: I cannot find my credit card  cvv in the app how frustrating‚Ä¶

title.label: Slow and very difficult to temporarily disable or enable credit card as need

content.label: The app comes with too complicated menu and navigation especially when the speed of refresh from a menu to another menu is too slow. And take many clicks to reach the function of disable or enable credit card. Pls do like Trust Bank, very easy to unlock my credit card when I need to use it for payment, then easily lock it again when I‚Äôm done with payment. Don‚Äôt need to worry about fraud and scam!
Ease of use
Credit card due payment and balance is so confused. After you have made a payment they won‚Äôt update the status and still telling you there is a dua amount need to pay.
App works perfectly.next to none down time on services
Very lag , go to point shop to redeem gifts have to restart the app for 8 times. Customer service function in the app is useless too.
Can‚Äôt link nric to paynow, always saying sorry for the inconvenience. Other functions that can‚Äôt be activated too, interface should be improved

App gives error messages advising you to retry transactions , even though the transactions have gone thru. Resulting in you repeating transactions erroneously , and their support team won‚Äôt even trace the issue unless you send proof of the error messages. Transfers can sometimes trigger additional verification but the app cannot handle both the transaction as well as the verification message, so you end up having to log on a desktop and leave the app ‚Äúfree‚Äù to receive the verification. Overall, terrible experience with this banking app. Only reminds me I should change banks.

Everything else is okay accept with the connection with SGfindex.

Also, it‚Äôs super hard to find the link to submit a ticket to the service desk.

Been trying to jumpstart my online banking with this app and bank but it always says it has an issue with the system and to keep trying. I would say to save your time and try other reputable and credible banks than an app that is always down.
